label: Person ID
description: Person identifier

label: Row num
description: Row number in the dataset

label: Binary choice
description: Dummy, =1 if this row is the car that was chosen

label: Price/ln(income)
description: Purchase price in thousands of dollars, divided by the natural log of household income in thousands

label: Range
description: Hundreds of miles that the vehicle can travel between refuelings/rechargings

label: Acceleration
description: Seconds required to reach 30 mph from stop, in tens of seconds (e.g., 3 s is entered as 0.3)

label: Top speed
description: Highest speed that the vehicle can attain, in hundreds of miles/h (e.g., 80 mph is entered as 0.80)

label: Pollution
description: Tailpipe emissions as fraction of comparable new gas vehicle

label: Size
description: 0"mini, 0.1"subcompact, 0.2"compact, 0.3"mid-size or large

label: Big enough
description: 1 if household size is over 2 and vehicle size is 3; 0 otherwise

label: Luggage space
description: Luggage space as fraction of comparable new gas vehicle

label: Operating cost
description: Cost per mile of travel, in tens of cents per mile (e.g., 5 cents/mile is entered as 0.5.). For electric vehicles, cost is for home recharging. For other vehicles, cost is for station refueling

label: Station availability
description: Fraction of stations that have capability to refuel/recharge the vehicle

label: Sports utility vehicle
description: 1 for sports utility vehicle, zero otherwise

label: Sports car
description: 1 for sports car, zero otherwise

label: Station wagon
description: 1 for station wagon, zero otherwise

label: Truck
description: 1 for truck, zero otherwise

label: Van
description: 1 for van, zero otherwise

label: Constant for EV
description: 1 for electric vehicle, zero otherwise

label: Commute*EV
description: 1 if respondent commutes less than five miles each day and vehicle is electric; zero otherwise

label: College*EV
description: 1 if respondent had some college education and vehicle is electric; zero otherwise

label: Constant for CNG
description: 1 for compressed natural gas vehicle, zero otherwise

label: Constant for methanol
description: 1 for methanol vehicle, zero otherwise

label: College*methanol
description: 1 if respondent had some college education and vehicle is methanol; zero otherwise

label: Non-EV
description: Dummy, =1 if car is not EV

label: Non-CNG
description: Dummy, =1 if car is not CNG

label: Car number
description: Index for the car number (0,1,...,5)

label: Chosen car
description: Index for the chosen car (0,1,...,5)
